title: Employee Directory
description: This employee directory is a full stack web app built on React and features the Random User API. The UI is comprised of components, responds to user search and clears the search bar.

title: Pizza Cutter
description: Restaurant Website with Admin Dashbaord to dynamically update menu items displayed on the live customer site.

title: Burger Application
description: Utilize this application to generate a list of hamburgers that are 'ready to eat' and 'devour' the burgers.
